summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackMoroccanoil Texture & Volume Powder is a non-aerosol dry styling powder that delivers instant volume and touchable texture. The lightweight formula works instantly on dry hair, providing buildable volume and flexible hold.

Remove cap, holding four to six inches away from dry roots. Gently press on pump to disperse. Start with one pump, adding more to build volume as needed. Style with your fingers until desired result is achieved. Tousle hair to reactivate volume throughout the day.Caution: Use product only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only. A little goes a long way, and I love how easy it is to revive the volume throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Yes

reviews.comments: So much volume! Loved the results this added to my hair and also the smell, makes it feel fresh + added the extra texture. I love a texture spray when I curl my hair vs a hair spray and this is great. Gifted by moroccanoil.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This product is amazing!!! It added so much texture and volume to my hair. I have fine, thin hair. It is normally so flat and never holds any volume but this stayed! I was very impressed and it smells good too. Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Nice texture and volume
reviews.comments: Complimentary from Moroccanoil. Firstly, I love the scent in all Moroccanoil products, it makes my hair smell nice. When I use this texture powder in my hair, it does add texture and volume after I blend it in. However, it leaves a slight sticky to the touch. Interestingly, if I use it with little amount at the root, blend it in and go to bed, I would wake up with nice volumed hair without the sticky touch. So that's how I have been using this powder for the past week.

reviews.headline: Flat hair no more!!!

reviews.headline: Adds Instant Volume & Freshness

I love how lightweight it is, my hair looks refreshed, fuller, and styled in just a few sprays. The packaging makes it easy to control how much product you use, and it doesn't leave any white residue. Definitely a new favorite for keeping my hair looking lively and fresh between washes. Highly recommend!

Gifted by moroccanoil.

reviews.headline: AMAZE!
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil‚Äî this is the best texture and volume powder I have used! It does not weigh down my hair but gives me that extra oomph in my ponytail/buns! Would highly recommend for anyone who has fine hair!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've been using the Moroccanoil Texture & Volume Powder and I'm really impressed.
It gives my hair instant lift and volume, especially at the roots.
The powder feels lightweight and doesn't leave any sticky or heavy residue.
I also love that it doesn't have a strong or noticeable smell.
Application is super easy ‚Äî just a few pumps and a little tousling with your fingers.
The finish is soft, natural, and semi-matte, which makes the hair look fresh and full.
It works great on fine hair and makes it appear thicker and more textured.
I like that it reactivates throughout the day with just a bit of touch-up.
It feels comfortable, not stiff, and keeps my hair flexible.
Overall, it's the perfect product for effortless, long-lasting volume.
Gifted by Moroccanoil
